profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.2.4 Colour Spaces - 6.2.4.3 Uncalibrated/Device colour spaces - DeviceCMYK
profile.description: DeviceCMYK shall only be used if a device independent DefaultCMYK colour space has been set or if a DeviceN-based DefaultCMYK colour space has been set when the DeviceCMYK colour space is used or the file has a PDF/A OutputIntent that contains a CMYK destination profile.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: DeviceCMYK shall only be used if a device independent DefaultCMYK colour space has been set or if a DeviceN-based DefaultCMYK colour space has been set when the DeviceCMYK colour space is used or the file has a PDF/A OutputIntent that contains a CMYK destination profile.

error.message: DeviceCMYK colour space is used without CMYK output intent profile
